synopsis.text: Inukai-sanâ€™s dog isn't your average canine, but rather, a high school student trapped in a dog's body! Our protagonist wakes up one rainy day to find himself transformed into a furry companion, only to be scooped up by his beautiful classmate, Karen Inukai. Despite her cool and aloof demeanor at school, Inukai-san has a soft spot for her new pet, showering him with affection and doting on him endlessly. As he navigates his new life as Pochita, the protagonist discovers a side of Inukai-san he never knew existed. With a curious blend of humor, romance, and ecchi, join us for a unique perspective on life in "My Life as Inukai-san's Dog" as we follow our protagonist's quest to regain his human form while enjoying the unexpected perks of being man's best friend.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
